snippet: The challenging project could be a precursor to other unconventional efforts to extract natural gas in the Middle East and North Africa.
abstract: Oman and BP say they have agreed to jointly develop a major, technically challenging natural gas field in country's desert interior.
lead_paragraph: The challenging project could be a precursor to other unconventional efforts to extract natural gas in the Middle East and North Africa.

headline.main: BP and Oman Agree to Jointly Develop a Gas Field, With Bigger Goals in Mind
headline.print_headline: BP and Oman Agree to Jointly Develop A Gas Field, With Bigger Goals in Mind
